items.title: What Stranger Things gets right about wormholes

• The story is set in Indiana in a fictional town called Hawkins that gets caught up with a paranormal world

items.title: Cremation pyre in Africa thought to be world’s oldest containing adult remains
bullets: • The pyre was found in a rock shelter at the foot of Mount Hora in northern Malawi
• It is thought to be the oldest in the world to contain adult remains, the oldest confirmed intentional cremation in Africa
• In total 170 individual bone fragments – apparently from an adult woman - were discovered in two clusters

• Greenpeace said the treaty could establish the largest network of ocean sanctuaries in history

• A decade later, you’ve got three flavors to choose from: the entry-level Watch SE, the standard Series, and the rugged Ultra
• Each appeals to a different demographic and set of needs

• It works with as few as four speakers installed in your car
• The system is available in select models of cars with Atmos speakers

items.title: UK Prime Minister says ‘we will take action’ on Grok’s disgusting deepfakes
bullets: • UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer says the country will take action against X following reports that the platform’s Grok AI chatbot is generating sexualized deepfakes of adults and minors
• X launched a feature that allows people to use Grok to edit any image on the platform without permission last month

• You can get phenomenal noise cancellation and sound quality in the premium tier if you're willing to spend big

items.title: YouTube will now let you filter Shorts out of search results
bullets: • YouTube is making a few changes to its search filters, including adding a new ‘Popularity’ one
• The company is also removing the “Upload Date - Last Hour” and “Sort by Rating” filters because they “were not working as expected”

• Zootopia 2 came in at number two with $19.38 million
• Greenland 2: Migration is the follow-up to 2020’s Greenland which, after its release was delayed multiple times, went direct-to-video during the height of the COVID-19 pandemic
